summary: Kaliyappan, the last hangman of Travancore dynasty is dragging his remaining life by consuming alcohol and worshipping the Mother Goddess.
cast: Oduvil Unnikrishnan|Sukumari|Reeja|Thara Kalyan|Murali|Sivakumar|Narain|Nedumudi Venu|Vijayaraghavan|Jagathi Sreekumar|Indrans|Kukku Parameshwaram
title: Nizhalkkuthu
